Adolf Hitler: The Definitive Biography [EPUB]

Pulitzer Prize-winning historian John TolandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s classic, definitive biography of Adolf Hitler remains the most thorough, readable, accessible, and, as much as possible, objective account of the life of a man whose evil effect on the world in the twentieth century will always be felt.
